explains: adj. 意气相投的；性格相似的；适意的；一致的

sentences.en: He found congenial officers who knew how to leaven war's rigours with riotous enjoyment.
sentences.cn: 他找到了和他志趣相投的懂得用狂欢来冲淡战争的残酷的军官。

sentences.en: I found in him a congenial temper.
sentences.cn: 他是一个和我意气相投的人。

sentences.en: He is back in more congenial company.
sentences.cn: 他回到了更令他愉快的同伴中。
